effect.then: Darpa, which is short for defence advanced research projects agency, funds most of the advanced robotics and A I projects in the world. The resulting military robots remind many people of the terminator robots. Say la vee.
I think DARPA is really cool but also a little scary, like with this total information awareness thing. I mean, hello big brother.

Darpa, which is short for defence advanced research projects agency, is the elite blue sky research branch of the american military. They do a lot, and I mean a lot, of robotics funding. Like billions of dollars.
They used to be called ARPA, then the government decided to clarify by adding the term defense to the name.
I think they do a lot of good, but you know they scare a lot of people. I understand that.

I think that the way to make DARPA robots safe, is from the inside. Someday I figure that if I study hard, and go to college, become a capable scientist and inventor, and then I'll go to work for darpa, and make robots that are not killing machines.
